name: Neat scrolling effect - Abastece aí app
description:
How to keep a fixed background while scrolling the foreground.


Multiple nested frames are pretty cool and may take your creativity to a whole new level.


Hire me: https://www.linkedin.com/in/izaias/


Suggestion to Figma: Add a field called Scroll Speed underneath Prototype / Overflow Behavior so we can create neat parallax (and other) effects without ever leaving Figma ♥️
